Articles.Content:
Hi! I don't really know if this belongs here but here a challenge. Basically build a plane and send a video(or anything that can prove) and compete with others. I'll join too, here is my plane: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inhcWU4hCmw 

It will compete by speed, passenger slot, safety, maneuverability, and extra point of any similar real life matches.

My plane: Speed 300-400 m/s, passenger slot 3, safety: 4/5, maneuverability: 3/5. Real life similar matches: mitsubishi ki-83(ok i don't even know this plane before. I know just by looking over old plane images lol it shocked me)   

 

Have fun!

 

Also no reward sorry

 

Edited January 26 by Andrew1233
